Articles.Content:
I know this is probably Blasphemy, 

I am also very new so maybe I have already missed a mod covering this topic

But how do people feel about another race, perhaps one eyed purple things with a catchy name.

let game play write the rest. 

SO...yes or no to alien races ? 

![nibbler_thumb.gif?imgmax=800](https://lh3.ggpht.com/_DeVkd7Dag10/TSNhygklkjI/AAAAAAAAFnk/ht-130VOOjc/nibbler_thumb.gif?imgmax=800)![420596836_simpsons_kang_kodos_answer_3_xlarge.jpeg](http://images.sodahead.com/polls/001483051/420596836_simpsons_kang_kodos_answer_3_xlarge.jpeg)![cartoon-green-alien-child-hi.png](http://www.clker.com/cliparts/g/c/9/k/v/6/cartoon-green-alien-child-hi.png)

**[MOD - Unfortunately, alien races other than Kerbals are on the** [**What Not To Suggest (WNTS) list**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/36863-What-not-to-suggest)**, and will not be in the first release version of the game.**

**Thread closed.]**
